Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Kyle Pantoja (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off Ruben Figueredo (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2015, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2016, hitting .435 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2017, hitting .450 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/12/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
